alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Showers with small hail will impact portions of southeastern Buchanan, northeastern Benton, western Delaware and northern Linn Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 646 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported showers producing pea sized hail along a line extending from near Winthrop to near Urbana. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Brief downpours from the stronger showers. Showers will be near... Winthrop around 650 PM CDT. Masonville around 655 PM CDT. Manchester and Troy Mills around 700 PM CDT. Paris around 705 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Central City, Coggon and Prairieburg. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 38 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
